sourcesContent:
import Head from 'next/head'; import { useRouter } from 'next/router'; import React from 'react'; import Layout from '../components/Layout'; import "../scss/fonts.scss"; import "../scss/style.scss"; import prices from '../components/prices.js'; // import services from '../services/items.js'; const OrderCompleted = () => { const router = useRouter() const { fullname, email, gender, age, health, healthstatus, phone, /* phonehome, */ fulladdress, /* urgent,*/ service, otherservice, date, period, time, area, pickup, visit, price} = router.query; console.log(JSON.stringify(router.query)) console.log('otherservice: ' + (otherservice == '')) const title = 'Order Completed' return ( {title}

Order Completed by {fullname}

Thank you for your order

The order information:

Order Date: 30 Aug 2019
Order Id: 203001
Service Name: {service}
{otherservice!==''?
Other service: {otherservice}
: null }
Area: {area}
Total price: {price}

Full Name: {fullname}
Email Address: {email}
Gender: {gender}
Age: {age}

Health: {health}
{healthstatus!==''?
Health Status: {healthstatus}
: null }
Phone Number: {phone}

home Address: 
{fulladdress}

{/*
Urgent Phone Number: {urgent}
*/}
Date: {date}
{/*
Start Time: {timefrom}
*/}
Period: {period} Hours Services
Time: {time}

Pickup Location: 
{pickup!==''?
{pickup}
:
(same as home address)
}

Visit Location: 
{visit}
 ) } export default OrderCompleted;
